nodes.text: Platform Trill 92 was a facility that orbited the planet Nyriaan.
Platform Trill 92 had a only a limited number of facilities, which included a cantina with an attached hotel, some repair facilities and an expensive general store.

During the waning years of the Galactic Republic a group of Republic agents landed on Platform Trill 92 while en route to Nyriaan. Onboard the facility, they met with members of the Hyperspace Navigator's Guild, who fitted the agents starship with a laser transport array system, to allow it to land on Nyriaan.
